extendedInfo.description: CornerStone Pediatric's application is an interactive application for all patients and physicians. The patient can schedule appointments from any page directly thru their Android device . They can go to our Facebook page directly from here. The interactive map simplifies and shows all locations with addresses, phone numbers and helps the patient find the location.The patient can also request office appointments directly from the office. The patient can open PDF files on their android device about different topics on pediatrics. Patient can also confirm his appointment after the office calls the patient, directly from your android.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Working Great, Thank you all for ur prompt respond to the error.
reviews.author: A Google User
